thread.title: Lily-Rose Depp and Vanessa Paradis Pose Together to Benefit Planned Parenthood - Lily-Rose Depp, Vanessa Paradis Joint Photoshoot
thread.title_full: Lily-Rose Depp and Vanessa Paradis Pose Together to Benefit Planned Parenthood - Lily-Rose Depp, Vanessa Paradis Joint Photoshoot

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Lily-Rose Depp and Vanessa Paradis Pose Together to Benefit Planned Parenthood - Lily-Rose Depp, Vanessa Paradis Joint Photoshoot
text:
Lily-Rose Depp and Vanessa Paradis star in the second issue of Our City of Angels magazine, proving that two generations of Chanel It girls are better than one. The Lagerfeld muses, aged 17 and 44 respectively, pose in cozy robes in a Parisian-esque hotel room, complete with pastries, floral arrangements and a couple of Chanel shopping bags in the corner. Aside from serving dreamy French-girl vibes, the spreadâ€”which was shot by David Mushegain and creative-directed by model Ash Stymest, Depp's rumored beauâ€”also benefits a good cause. One hundred percent of all proceeds from Our City of Angels copies will be donated directly to Planned Parenthood. Hard copies will be sold in Colette in Paris and online at ourcityofangels.com later this week.
